## Contains class

Filters is a key component when communicating with a backend. The Contains filter is meant for text-queries. Contains is not part of standard SQL and should be extended when used on a database datasource

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Contains implements Filter 
```
**Implements:** [Filter](./forms42core.filter.md)
